name: Tank Of Tanks Battle Fight-Real Tanks War Strikes
name_original: Tank Of Tanks Battle Fight-Real Tanks War Strikes
description:
Four players, one iPad! Dominate your friends in chaotic half a minute death matches.

Tank Battle is an easy-to-learn one-button arcade tank game for up to four players on a single iPad.

Controls:
Push the button to move and shoot. Release to turn.

Features:
• Massively local four player action!
• Simple one-button controls
• Frantic 30-second death matches
• Fun levels like Arena, Revolver and Box Pit
